languages.text: "Мне нужны новые люди на замену погибшим во время нападения на корабль. И материальная компенсация".
"I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."
languages.original_text: "Мне нужны новые люди на замену погибшим во время нападения на корабль. И материальная компенсация".

traits.locale_text: "I need new crew members to replace those killed in the attack on my ship. And I need material reimbursement."
"I need new crew members to replace those killed in the attack on my ship. And I need material reimbursement."
"I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."
"I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."
"I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."
"I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

languages.text: "Ich brauche neue Crewmitglieder, um die zu ersetzen, die bei dem Angriff auf mein Schiff gestorben sind. Und ich brauche eine materielle Entschädigung."
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich brauche neue Crewmitglieder, um die zu ersetzen, die bei dem Angriff auf mein Schiff gestorben sind. Und ich brauche eine materielle Entschädigung."

languages.text: « J'ai besoin de nouveaux membres d'équipage pour remplacer ceux tués durant l'attaque contre mon vaisseau. Et j'ai besoin d'une compensation matérielle. »
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai besoin de nouveaux membres d'équipage pour remplacer ceux tués durant l'attaque contre mon vaisseau. Et j'ai besoin d'une compensation matérielle. »

languages.text: “我需要一批新的船员，填补那些阵亡船员的空白。此外，我还需要物资补给。”
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: “我需要一批新的船员，填补那些阵亡船员的空白。此外，我还需要物资补给。”

languages.text: 「船を襲った攻撃で命を落としたクルーの代わりに、新しいクルーが欲しい。それから現物支給もいただけないだろうか」
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: 「船を襲った攻撃で命を落としたクルーの代わりに、新しいクルーが欲しい。それから現物支給もいただけないだろうか」

languages.text: «Necesito nueva tripulación para reemplazar a los muertos en el ataque a la nave. Y necesito una compensación material».
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: «Necesito nueva tripulación para reemplazar a los muertos en el ataque a la nave. Y necesito una compensación material».

languages.text: "Gemime yapılan saldıranlarda ölenlerin yerini alacak yeni tayfalara ihtiyacım var. Ayrıca maddi tazminata da..."
languages.original_text: "I need fresh crew to replace those killed in the attack on the ship. And I need material compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Gemime yapılan saldıranlarda ölenlerin yerini alacak yeni tayfalara ihtiyacım var. Ayrıca maddi tazminata da..."
